Repository Name Unauthorized: Schriener University Archives and Special Collections
Notes: The Schreiner Collections include the university and student publications archives, documents and manuscripts from past university presidents, theses, memorabilia, photographs, and a variety of media related to the history of Schreiner Institute, College and University. The Texas Hill Country Collection focuses on the settlement of Kerr County and contains approximately 320 linear feet of printed material and 10,000 photographs, in addition to a small collection of audio-visual materials and letters, including the counties of Bandera, Blanco, Burnet, Comal, Edwards, Gillespie,  Kendall, Kerr, Kimble, Llano, Mason, Medina, Real and Uvalde.
